==============
Jam.py roadmap
==============

We plan to add the following features to Jam.py:

* Record locking when a user edits a record in DB table. Implementation of it in 
  the Application Builder.
* Language support stage 1: Support for other languages.
* Language support stage 2: internalization, support for multiple languages in 
  the project.
* Support for mobile devices.  
* Support for Bootstrap 4.
* Rework of import/export utility: visual interface, control over merging of changes.
* Creation of tools for analyzing the number of different requests and the time 
  of their execution.
* LDAP Integration
* DBTree component
